title: AI can now kill those annoying cookie pop-ups
content:
The EU may have brought freedoms, peace, and wealth to millions of people, but all those benefits have been nullified by one horrendous drawback: cookie pop-ups. Quite struck on this visit how ubiquitous and how pointless cookie warnings are on the web in Europe. description: A new AI plug-in that automatically selects the safest cookies settings has put the notifications on notice.
